caption: The video tells the story of a team in order to carry the flint key to start the engine on Earth. A brother and sister's grandfather had to die trying to save the rest of the team during the transport. The brother and sister are the drivers of the vehicle, and become suspicious of the entire team, and leave the team after a dispute. In the next scene, the brother and sister's father wakes up from the space war, the father is an astronaut, in an emergency hatch locked, the father has to travel with his teammates in space to another zone. The next scene cuts back to the brother and sister, who, after trekking some distance through the ice field, find a team whose pilot has been killed. The brother and sister joined a new team.
